about_the_game:
Inspired by the classic survival horror games of the 90's, PsychoDive turns the genre on it's head while retaining all the classic gameplay tropes we've come to love.



You play the role of Lennox, a psychic with the ability to dive into people's minds and see what's inside. As expected, you will rarely go into someone's mind without seeing things you aren't supposed to. Inside you can see all repressed memories, trauma, and pain, but in physical form... at least to Lennox.

You will dive into the minds of 4 characters, including the pilot of a plane you are flying on, a former supermodel, a dentist, and a little girl. Each one of them broken in one way or another and you must help them overcome their pasts. But be warned... it won't be easy.



Greenfield Asylum is the hub world, where you can visit patients in their rooms and prepare them for a PsychoDive.

Going into minds is tricky because you never know what to expect. There may be inner demons to fight, which shouldn't be too much a problem as long as you can find a weapon. There are also often traps to avoid, pitfalls to traverse, and jumping across platforms. It's all worth it if you can reach them though.



Lennox - A reluctant but powerful psychic who keeps finding himself at the wrong place at the wrong time. He's a good person but also very stoic and prefers to be alone.

Monroe - A detective for the city's special unit on supernatural elements. She can come off as carefree, but she is a no nonsense person who doesn't mess around.

Dr. Amos - Head Psychologist at the asylum, he is very by-the-book and doesn't believe that psychic abilities are real. Though for the sake of science, he's going to observe what happens.

Pilot - An airline pilot in the midst of a nervous breakdown. Unfortunately he's the pilot of the plane you are currently on...

Selene - A supermodel at the height of fame when it all suddenly comes crashing down. Maybe she couldn't handle the pressure of looking good 24/7?

Emily - Why is a full grown woman acting like a small child? Maybe the adult world isn't cut out for everyone.

Dr. Patel DDS - Everyone hates going to the dentist... especially when that dentist has a criminal history of kidnapping and torture.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You play as Lennox, a psychic who ends up in prison for a good deed gone bad. A detective and a psychologist offer him freedom in exchange for help using his abilities. But what starts as yet another good deed quickly devolves into true psychological horror.
